{"title": "EXO-Planet", "title_search": "exoplanet", "title_keyword": "exoplanet", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/exo-planet/", "summary": "Free yourself from the bonds of gravity in EXO-Planet for the iPad, the first 3rd-person shooter in space! {"title": "Igowin 13x13", "title_search": "igowin 13x13", "title_keyword": "igowin 13x13", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/igowin-13x13/", "summary": "Igowin 13x13 brings the ancient game of strategy, Go, into the 21st century and puts it right in the palm of your hand. With the most powerful Go software available for the iPhone or iPod Touch, Igowin 13x13 will challenge you no matter what your level, and keep you at the top of your game.  Igowin 13x13 uses the same Go engine as The Many Faces Of Go. That's the three time world computer Go champion that has been in ongoing development for over 25 years. It draws on more than two and a half decades of experience, a massive knowledge base and the newest research, as well as modern Monte Carlo techniques to help you learn and grow as a player. This is, hands down, the strongest Go engine available for the iPhone or iPod Touch.  Igowin 13x13 has the most comprehensive tutorial of any app of its kind. You get a good solid understanding of the game, and can begin playing immediately. With no complex menus and just a few basic controls, the game is easy to navigate. The convenient "undo" feature lets you reset a mis-tap, without waiting for the computer to finish thinking. All levels are calibrated by play, on an online server. That means that the ranking Igowin 13x13 gives you is very close to what your real-world ranking would be, rather than an arbitrary number that only applies within the app.  Igowin 13x13 uses the traditional Kyu ranking system to measure your performance.  The engine automatically adjusts its level of play to match yours. By using the calibrated rankings within the Go engine, it can play a 13x13 even game, with no handicaps, against any player, from beginner all the way up to 3 dan level.     Whether you're a rookie looking for a fun new way to learn and play the game of Go, or a crafty veteran looking for a challenge, Igowin 13x13 is the app you've been searching for. Take Igowin 13x13 wherever you go, and play it whenever you have a few minutes to burn.  It's always ready for a quick game, or a long session.   With Igowin 13x13 on your iPhone or iPod Touch, you're ready to start playing the 4000 year old game that takes a few minutes to learn, and a lifetime to master.", "genre": ["Board"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-02-25", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-147891-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-147891-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Smart Games (Publisher)", "Smart Games (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Sudoku 16 Monster", "title_search": "sudoku 16 monster", "title_keyword": "sudoku 16 monster", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/sudoku-16-monster/", "summary": "\"Sudoku 16 Monster\" is a big and challenging 16x16 Sudoku game specifically designed for the iPad. It has excellent features that will allow you to solve the puzzle easier as the game does the boring tasks while you do the thinking: 5000 puzzles; 5 levels; 7 color skins; AutoFill mode; Smart shortcuts and more!\r \r NOW ON SALE for only $0.99!\r  \r FEATURES AND OPTIONS:\r - 5000 puzzles\r - 5 difficulty levels\r - 7 color skins for every taste\r - 3 smart double tap shortcuts\r - AutoFill mode\r - Manual mode\r - Manual mode with smart notes\r - Conflict alert\r - Hint feature\r - Clear notes and reset features\r - Multi-Touch grid\r - Timer\r - Sound\r \r COMING SOON IN THE NEXT RELEASE:\r - Undo/Redo functionality\r - 10000 puzzles\r - More skins and themes\r - Landscape mode\r \r FEATURES EXPLAINED:\r - AutoFill Mode - all notes will be automatically populated and then kept in sync with the numbers you enter. You can remove notes. You can add notes only if you previously removed them. In this mode the game does everything for you and lets you do the thinking. As in all Sudoku games with AutoFill mode enabled: it is just too easy to play level one and two, so use it only for higher levels.\r You can switch back to manual mode - the auto-populated notes will remain.\r - Manual Mode - you are responsible for adding/removing notes. No restrictions.\r \r - Manual Mode with \"smart notes\" - you are responsible for adding/removing notes, but the game will auto cleanup the corresponding notes when you enter a new number.\r If you change your mind and remove the number the game will put them back.\r In manual mode you can use the \"Clear Notes\" button to clear all notes.\r \r - Double tap shortcuts - very convenient for this type of big puzzle:\r 1. If you want to quickly remove a number you entered - just double-tap it\r 2. When there is only one note in a certain square - double tap it and the note will become the number\r 3. If a row, column or sub-square is populated with unique numbers and there is only one number left - double-tap the square - the remaining number will appear.\r - Conflict alert - it will show you that you have entered a wrong number.\r The feature works differently in AutoFill mode and manual mode: In manual mode it will alert you if you have a conflicted number on the same row, column or sub-square.\r In AutoFill mode it is obvious from the notes which numbers can be entered, so in that case it will also alert you if you entered a wrong number.\r If it looks like you have solved the puzzle, but nothing happens, enable conflict alert and switch to AutoFill mode to see what you have done wrong.\r \r - Clear notes in manual mode feature will clear all notes\r \r - Reset puzzle (located in the main menu) will allow you to reset the current puzzle and start over\r \r - Hint - press the \"Hint\" button and one unknown number will be revealed\r \r - Multi-Touch grid - you can touch the grid with up to five fingers and the rows/columns touch will be highlighted - mostly for fun, but you can use it to highlight more than one row and column and concentrate on the numbers\r \r - Timer - game timer - you can turn it on and off from the main menu\r \r - Sound - you can turn it on and off from the main menu\r \r For questions, feedback, support and features requests please email at info@sudoku16monster.com\r \r Enjoy!", "genre": ["Logic Puzzle"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-05-13", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154311-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154311-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": [], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "CastleCraft", "title_search": "castlecraft", "title_keyword": "castlecraft", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/castlecraft/", "summary": "Wage war against hundreds of others for realm domination! In this massively-multiplayer, city building strategy game, players follow three different quest lines, form alliances, and train different types of military, resource and technology units. Play against friends and others, chat in realtime, and watch your gorgeous city expand under intricate day-night cycles with dynamic particle effects  in developer Infinite Lives' newest title. Collect Dragon Crystals to power up your city with magic and bring your foes to their knees!  Features:  - Build up your town and watch your minions go about their daily business in the City view, and then go to the World view to explore the land around your city  - Chat with other players online in real time and interact with other players through the messaging system.  - Train up to 16 different types of military units as well as 16 different types of resource and technology buildings to build.  - Build and upgrade resource buildings to increase your Gold, Lumber and Food production.  - Dragon Crystal meteors will periodically fall out of the sky, send your troops out to capture them and harvest that magical power to build magical buildings and units.  - War or Peace? Expand your empire by conquering and occupying neighboring cities, or form strategic alliances to gain intel about distant lands.  -Plus+ integration for leader boards, stats, and sharing your journey with friends and family! As a reward for a job well done, outfit your cantina with decorations and attractions to appeal to even the most difficult customers.  Familiar Star Wars characters, original and colorful visual style, a customizable cantina and casual but challenging gameplay make sure that the game feels as fresh as a cool drink on a hot Tatooine afternoon. {"title": "Big Bad Sudoku Book", "title_search": "big bad sudoku book", "title_keyword": "big bad sudoku book", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/big-bad-sudoku-book/", "summary": "Get the #1 most downloaded iPad app last weekend and the "Best Sudoku Game on ANY platform".  FOR A LIMITED TIME WE LOWERED THE PRICE TO $1.99!  GET IT BEFORE IT GOES BACK UP TO $2.99.  "If Apple made a sudoku game I think it would look like this" - Dytavio  "The whole look is perfect... This is the best sudoku interface of the five sudoku apps I have downloaded. I suspect the rest will be removed from my iPad" - GrayerBeard  We are busy working on version 1.1 which will make it even better.  Big Bad Sudoku Book is a magical sudoku puzzle book that comes alive beneath your fingertips.  It was created exclusively for the Apple iPad to have the look and feel of a physical ancient sudoku book.  It's completely gesture based and offers a playing experience that you can only get on an iPad.  The game play mimics pencil and paper.  Answers or pencil marks can be entered quickly without 'switching input modes' or using any 'buttons'.  Big Bad Sudoku has some magical ways of helping you solve puzzles:  First are Highlights - a revolutionary way to see sudoku puzzles. With highlights you can softly highlight cells, rows, or columns with the gesture of a finger. They help focus your attention and narrow down possibilities. You can use highlights to temporarily mark positives or negatives.  - Swipe into a row to highlight the whole row, or swipe into a column to highlight the whole column.  - Press and hold on a number to highlight all occurrences of that number. - Press and hold again to highlight all rows, columns and blocks for all of those occurrences. - 'Draw' on the board to highlight cells. - Tap off the board to clear all highlights.  Next are 'Marks'. Sometimes known as pencil marks, candidates or possibles, these are small numbers or dots placed around the corners of the cells to help keep track of numbers that could fit there. To enter your own marks tape the small dots on the inside ring of the Pen. You can also Reveal the True Marks for the puzzle and they will actively update as you solve the puzzle. True marks and your own marks are two separate properties that you can show or hide at will.  Finally, if the puzzle is too hard to figure out, the 'Get Hint' spell will give you a clue to help solve your puzzle. It might direct you to a cell and tell you your answer is incorrect. Or it might highlight an empty cell and tell you that a 'Single' or a 'Hidden Single' can be found there.  The Big Bad Sudoku Book is a virtual book full of millions of Sudoku puzzles and is perfect for casual gaming.  Other magical features:  * Contrary to the false reviews - the game does save and restore your puzzle. * Millions of puzzle combinations in 4 difficulty levels. * No Lame Repetitive Music - so you can listen to your iPod music while playing. * Quick Start jumps right back into the gameplay - right where you left off! * Numbers "draw" on the board. * "Wipe" an answer to clear it, but just like real paper - a little smudge will be left behind. * Operates in all orientations.  Known cosmetic bug: After relaunching the game the puzzle label always shows as EASY.  The puzzle in progress reloads as it was when you quit.  Only the label is wrong.  We are working on an update that fixes this minor issue and adds many exciting new features.  GET THE FULL VERSION NOW and update it for FREE when the update comes out.  IMPORTANT TECH SUPPORT NOTE: Please cycle power on your iPad after installing any new software.", "genre": ["Logic Puzzle"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-04-01", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-148734-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-148734-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Bad Weasel, LLC (Developer)", "Bad Weasel, LLC (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Bejeweled Blitz", "title_search": "bejeweled blitz", "title_keyword": "bejeweled blitz", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/bejeweled-blitz/", "summary": "The all-new, standalone Bejeweled Blitz is here, and it’s FREE! If you played Blitz in Bejeweled 2, this is the game you’ve been asking for. We’ve separated Bejeweled Blitz from the Bejeweled 2 app so we can make sure every game update is 100% dedicated to Bejeweled Blitz — so you’ll get faster updates and even more Facebook connectivity. Play with your friends and rocket up the leaderboard with a seamless Facebook gameplay experience. Plus, you’ll enjoy gorgeous retina display graphics and The Daily Spin bonus for free coins every day! We’ve got lots of great new stuff planned for Bejeweled Blitz, so get ready for lots of fun, new features!And if you’re looking for more than just Bejeweled Blitz, check out our all-new Bejeweled for iOS. Based on the hit game Bejeweled 3, the new Bejeweled has three sparkling game modes (including the super-popular Diamond Mine), badges, and gorgeous retina display graphics. And if you love playing both games, it's easy to switch between Bejeweled and Bejeweled Blitz from inside each game. We hope you love the new Bejeweled Blitz. Please be sure to rate the game below or tell us what you think in our forums at PopCap.com. Your feedback is important to us at PopCap!***NOTE TO BEJEWELED 2 + BLITZ PLAYERS***Thanks for the feedback!  We built the new Bejeweled Blitz to create a level playing field across all versions of iPhones and iPods, but understand that some of our more experienced players feel like the game plays slower. {"title": "MIKADO DEFENDERS", "title_search": "mikado defenders", "title_keyword": "mikado defenders", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/mikado-defenders/", "summary": "Mikado Defenders: an original feudal Japanese defense simulation for the iPhone / iPod touch!  In Mikado Defenders players deploy samurai foot soldiers, archers, and other units, desperately attempting to defend their fortress from an all-out demonic attack. It’s tower defense, with a uniquely Japanese twist!   Set in the Sengoku Era—a time when Japan was torn asunder by civil war—  Mikado Defenders features historical locations such as Edo and Osaka, renowned samurai commanders including Uesugi Kenshin and the “One-Eyed Dragon” Masamune, powerful Guardian Spirit allies, giant demonic enemies, an in-depth castle improvement system and more!   Special Characteristics:   - Castle Improvement –   Build your base up from a humble campsite to an impregnable fortress, complete with barricades and turrets! Investing in your castle is vital if you’re to have any hope fending off the Skull Wheel and other massive demons!   - Guardian Spirits –   Hold off the attacking demons for long enough and your castle will attract the aid of mystical allies. A single attack from one of these Guardian Spirits boasts the power to turn the tide of battle! Guardian Spirits also improve with your fortress; the stouter your defenses, the more powerful your ally!  - Samurai Commanders –   Reinforcing your castle and successfully destroying a “boss” giant demon has the chance of drawing a new samurai commander to your side! Recruit Oda Nobunaga, Sanada Yukimura, Date Masamune, and more! Each commander has their own special characteristics, and these abilities will prove vital in staging a successful defense!  - Class Change System -  Each unit will be promoted to an elite class by increasing its level to certain point!  -Taste of The Traditional Japan Art -   Not only the in-depth tower defense game system, Mikado Defenders features the Japan Art taste throughout the game, inspired from such art style as “ukiyo-e” paintings, and “sumi-e” paintings.   Other Features:   - Simple yet strategic game play! - Intuitive goals: place your troops on the map, fend off attacking demons, and guard your castle! - Easy controls: deploy samurai, select commanders, and unleash powerful guardian spirit attacks through intuitive taps and flicks! - Play on your terms: you can suspend games mid-level, and come back to them later, picking up right where you left off! - Selectable music: enjoy the provided ZUNTATA soundtrack or listen your own tunes!", "genre": ["Simulation"], "metascore": "64", "critic_reviews": 7, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-04-19", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-151601-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-151601-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Taito Corporation (Publisher)", "Taito Corporation (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Anytime Sutda! - The Oriental Poker", "title_search": "anytime sutda the oriental poker", "title_keyword": "anytime sutda the oriental poker", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/anytime-sutda-the-oriental-poker/", "summary": "=== [AD] Do you know this game? ========= ? Anytime Blackjack - the blackjack game with big and sharp cards. ? Anytime Hexa - the puzzle game like Tetris. ==================================== Anytime Sutda! - The Oriental Poker You can read more detail description with images at the web site, http://blueminz.egloos.com/10462148 - FEATURES - 1. Real images of Hwatoo cards are used. 2. World ranking is supported. 3. Win Rate information is supported. 4. Smooth movement. 1. Introduction to Anytime Sutda™ Sutda is an oriental card game similar to poker. But sutda uses “Hwatoo” cards instead of trump cards that poker does. 2. About Hwatoo cards Hwatoo is made up 12 varieties of group, and each card group means from January to December. One card group consists of 4 similar cards. Therefore, there are 48 cards in total. Sutda uses 20 Hwatoo cards from among 48 Hwatoo cards. 20 Hwatoo cards use 2 cards each among from January to October. Basically, each player receives 2 cards, and the issue of a game is decided by the combination of 2 cards Hwatoo cards can be combined variously, and each combination is ranked according to the Jokbo table.
